title: A 3rd party application has cause the game to crash. Please deactivate or uninstall any 3rd party...
body:
"the program can't start because chrome_elf.dll is missing from your computer" i think i saw that for a split second. Did a full repair on league, still same problem. I even got a leaverbuster because i couldnt reconnect, granted, it was at the start of the match and they remade but still

riot pls help.

replies.body: If that repair wasn't working, you may need to go ahead and trying using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on. Also make sure you're running the HRT and game client as admin!
